channel.title: Bitestring Blog
channel.description: Thoughts and articles related to programming, free software, web, privacy and security.

item.title: A little tip to improve rust-analyzer memory usage
item.description: Rust-Analyzer is a LSP server for IDEs like VSCode, Emacs, Vim etc. However it suffers from very high memory usage in some use cases. This blog post provides a tip to reduce memory usage if you are using FFIs and bindgen in your Rust projects.
item.dc:creator: Bitestring

item.title: Web fingerprinting is worse than I thought
item.description: Discussing current state of web fingerprinting and how to protect yourself
item.dc:creator: Bitestring

item.title: Quick guide to basic Date/Time operations in Haskell
item.description: Explaining how to consume frequently used date/time functions in Haskell
item.dc:creator: Bitestring
